issue.title: youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > YouTube is playing ads, and AdGuard Pro is not blocking them (except possibly mid-roll ads). This has been going on for over a week, despite updates, restarting, rebooting, etc. Does not seem to happen on my phone, only my iPad Pro. Please help! Thank you! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/7s5tw2xbil4wo0owokwocgo44o0s4okh2km6a5cli8.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.14 (1040) System version: | `iPadOS 26` License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard DNS`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Other extensions used: | `None`

comment.body:
@Alex-302 
> Still cannot start stream. I have an IP cam. Can be RTSP stream used here?

I think it is possible to use it as RTSP, but I believe it will be difficult to reference it directly from the YouTube Live browser dashboard. (I think you will need to relay it with a software encoder.)

ref: Create a YouTube live stream with an encoder - YouTube Help
[https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2907883](https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/2907883)

There are countless websites that explain how to stream on YouTube Live, so please search in your own language.
